!Trader Alexis: Would you care to buy a ring for your lover? Or, how about a necklace for your mother? Come on over and take a look, sir! All the products we carry are made by the skilled hands of Elven Artisans. Although their superior craftsmanship is not immediately apparent, it shows in the use, and the passage of time.
